t: Amazon to Buy Online Pharmacy PillPack, Jumping Into the Drug Business - The New York Times
s: June 28, 2018 - In the world of health care, PillPack, an online pharmacy, is a pretty small player. Its work force of 1,000 or so people pales in comparison with the 235,000 who work for Walgreens. But when Amazon announced on Thursday that it was buying PillPack, the deal immediately shook the industry.
